subject: Colleges and Universities

NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The reason behind their motivation? How about 1 billion of them? That is the number of dollars offered by Quicken Loans for an unblemished result in predicting N.C.A.A. tournament games
